favorites.text: What can I say? I could eat the whole bunch of em. They are the first to run out at my house.
Reeds is my favorite store bought brand, but brewing my own is simple and delicious.
Spending quality time with the kids and experiencing new things. These are what make a vacation awesome.
A floating hotel that takes you to several fun exotic locales. With almost everything included crusing is a great value.
The 3000 piece ocean scene Ravensburger is a fun one to do.
